query:
SELECT 
  id,
  tipoDivergencia,
  cvNsu,
  valorEsperado,
  valorEncontrado,
  diferenca,
  descricao,
  statusResolucao,
  createdAt
FROM divergencias_fechamento
WHERE statusResolucao = 'pendente'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10

  valorEsperado,
  valorEncontrado,
  diferenca,

  statusResolucao,
  createdAt
FROM divergencias_fechamento
WHERE statusResolucao = 'pendente'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10
